tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_production (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  panel_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  production_kwh FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE certification (
  certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_id INT,
  certification_date DATE,
  certification_status VARCHAR(50),
  certification_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (production_id) REFERENCES energy_production(production_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SolarPanelCertification (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    production_time TIME,
    energy_produced DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE CertificationRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_id INT,
    agency_id INT,
    certification_date DATE,
    certification_result VARCHAR(100)
);
